title: 9,000,000 Things I Wish I Knew Before I Said "I Do": For Him
description: Single? Dating? Married? This book is a man’s cheat code to understanding what to expect once you tie the knot. Witty and slightly inappropriate relationship advice with a humorous twist. I've been married for 3 years, 255 days, 17 hours, 32 minutes and counting so trust me when I tell you that women are trouble! No video games, tons of rules, and a big honey-do list. Good news! This book is full of 'Wife Hacks' that will help get you through any tough relationship. Educational and entertaining, you'll love this book so much you won’t be able to put it down!
author: Kitty Liquor
